metadata.title: US MILITARY F-1B Air Force Extreme Cold Weather Pants Overalls ECW Trousers GI
features: Outer shell 80% cotton 20% nylon, interlining 100% polyester.
F-1B AIR Force Extreme COLD Weather Overalls USAF
They measure 2 inches larger than actual size. Size 32=34inches, size 40=42 inches etc! U.S. Air Force mark just on size 36 (7th photo).
Waterproof and Fire Retandant! Very warm and comfy!
Made in USA! Issued by the US Government!
description: NEW, Military surplus NOS (new-old stock). They measure 2 inches larger than actual size: size 32=34inches, size 40=42 inches etc! U.S. Air Force mark just on size 36 (7th photo)! Genuine USAF issue Extreme cold weather Flight trousers worn over regular trousers for extreme cold weather climates. Cotton shell and lining with thick polyester insulation, zipper fly and leg bottoms with knit cuffs. Reinforced knees and seat. Two front and rear pockets with velcro closures. Can be used with button down suspenders - INCLUDED!!- Upper zippers for access to inner trousers. WATERPROOF & FIRE RETARDANT !! Outer shell 80% cotton 20% nylon, interlining 100% polyester. Great for winter wear outside,hunting,cycling.riding. etc. Very warm and comfy. Smaller sizes are great for the ladies and teens.
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Item Weight": "4 Pounds", "Department": "Mens", "Date First Available": "November 8, 2016"}
